summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 DODGE RAM 1500. THE CONTACT RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13V038000 (POWER TRAIN) IN THE MAIL SEVERAL MONTHS AGO BUT THE DEALER STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. *TR
